item.title: Personal Privacy and Security
item.description: Why does it matter? From privacyguides.org: “I have nothing to hide. Why should I care about my privacy?” Much like the right to interracial marriage, woman’s suffrage, freedom of speech, and many others, we didn’t always have the right to privacy.
